unit: Unit 7 | Inference for Quantitative Data: Means
title: Average Home Price - Realtor
question_text: A realtor is interested in the average price of homes in his state. He randomly selects $16\text{ homes}$ and records the prices. The $16\text{ homes}$ averaged a price of $\$183{,}482$ with a standard deviation of $\$41{,}023$ . If the realtor wishes to determine if this year’s prices are higher than last year’s state average of $\$175{,}000$ , what would be the appropriate null and alternative hypotheses?
